name: pal-pad
effect: Contains friend codes for up to 32 other players, as well as their sprite, gender, and basic statistics for those that have been seen on WFC.
short_effect: Use to record Friend Codes and check your own.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends and keeping a record of game play.
flavor_text.platinum: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends, Friend Codes, and keeping a record of game play.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends, Friend Codes, and keeping a record of game play.
